backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization, blob storage mixins, and extensive types for users, master data, dynamic forms, and task management; state maps are initialized for storing system data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence for feature tracking.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Defines the HTML root container and loads the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main application router, layout shell, authentication wrapper, and routes for admin and task pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a button to navigate home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout handling using Internet Identity with UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for creating a user profile with name, email, and department fields.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guards content so only admin users can access it, otherwise showing an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Handles authentication flow and prompts users to log in or complete profile setup before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/forms/DynamicFor: Renders form fields dynamically based on a form definition, managing state and handling submissions for various field types including uploads.
frontend/src/components/forms/FieldDefin: Displays and edits a single form field definition with controls for label, type, validations, and optional lookup source.
frontend/src/components/forms/fields/Fil: Handles file selection, simulated upload progress, and removal, passing file metadata and bytes back to the parent.
frontend/src/components/forms/FormDefini: Provides an editor for form definitions, allowing adding, removing, updating, and reordering fields along with naming the form.
frontend/src/components/forms/Submission: Shows a read-only view of submitted form values, formatting files, arrays, and simple values based on field definitions.
Defines the main application layout with sidebar navigation, header, footer, and admin/user-specific navigation items.
frontend/src/components/layout/NavSectio: Renders a navigational section inside the sidebar, highlighting active routes and handling navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/components/masters/FixedMas: Reusable CRUD UI for fixed master data with dialog-based create/edit and table listing.
frontend/src/components/masters/MasterLi: Editor for user-defined master lists including item addition, removal, and CRUD actions.
frontend/src/components/tasks/PickupTask: Button that triggers a task pickup mutation and shows pending state and toasts.
frontend/src/components/tasks/ReassignTa: Dialog for reassigning a task to a user or department with form inputs and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/SlaStatusB: Displays a badge indicating SLA state such as on-track, at-risk, or breached.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormsP: Shows forms attached to a task with indicators for completion and actions to open or view submissions.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskJourne: Renders a vertical timeline of task journey events with timestamps and details.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskListTa: Displays a table of tasks with status, assignment, SLA, form progress, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/hooks/forms/useFormDefiniti: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating form definitions using an actor backend interface.
frontend/src/hooks/forms/useFormSubmissi: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and submitting form submissions, currently using placeholder backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/forms/useLookupOption: Fetches lookup option lists based on master type or list ID, returning empty arrays until backend queries exist.
frontend/src/hooks/masters/useMasters.ts: Contains query and mutation hooks for managing master data like departments, categories, statuses, and priorities with placeholder fetch logic.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks/useAssignmentAc: Defines mutations for picking up and reassigning tasks, invalidating related task queries after success.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks/useTaskDefiniti: Provides hooks to fetch and mutate task definitions and tasks, using placeholder backend calls and invalidating caches on changes.
Fetches a task’s journey events with a placeholder backend call.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the current user's profile, role, and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity integration, providing identity state, login, logout, and context management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Adds a mutation hook for saving the caller’s user profile and refreshing related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wiring React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/FormBuilderPage: Admin page to list, create, edit, and delete form definitions using a form editor and CRUD hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MastersPage.tsx: Admin interface with tabbed CRUD management for departments, categories, statuses, priorities, task types, and master lists.
frontend/src/pages/admin/TaskDefinitions: Placeholder admin page for future task definition creation and management.
Placeholder page for creating tasks from task definitions with basic navigation UI.
frontend/src/pages/tasks/DepartmentPoolP: Displays department‑assignable tasks using a task list table with loading support.
frontend/src/pages/tasks/FormSubmissionV: Loads and displays a form submission with its form definition, handling missing or loading states.
frontend/src/pages/tasks/MyTasksPage.tsx: Shows the current user's assigned tasks in a list with loading indication.
Displays detailed task info, journey timeline, forms, and assignment actions with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON storing project metadata, feature list, and requirements for a low‑code task and form management system with master data, dynamic forms, and workflows.
